name: Drift Simulator: Camaro Copo
description:
Discover the fast track drifting world with this car racing game and enjoy the exciting highway stunts duo for the very first time with a expensive sports car Camaro Copo. Discover the drifting world with the best Drift Simulator : Camaro Copo on the market. This top-of-the-line multi-car racing sports venture is done to provide a thrilling and adventurous platform to the car lovers.

Drift simulation highway racing gameplay mode allows you to test your crazy drifting skills on various city tracks. Use different sprayers for vehicle painting in order to get a better look for your speed racer. In-Vehicle Controls with forward and reverse gears adds more flexibility in driving mechanism. Other excellent features which you must oversee are the robust steering wheel, buttons, and touch steering.

Features!

- Multiple Luxury Cars
- Free driving mode and racing mode
- 3D Maps for car navigation
- High quality drifting physics
- Smooth controls
- Rear Camera view
- Advanced 4 wheel drive
- Modern racing dynamics
- Surprise crashes with obstacles and hurdles
